Article.Title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

Requirements: Requires a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data
Recognised or enforceable only if based on an international agreement

Decisions.Type: administrative authority of a third country
Requirements: Requires a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data
Recognised or enforceable only if based on an international agreement

International Agreement.Conditions: in force between the requesting third country and the Union or a Member State
International Agreement.Note: without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter
